sen.j: 磯城瑞籬宮（しきのみずかきのみや）は六国史日本書紀に記載されている崇神天皇王朝の都。
sen.e: Shiki no Mizukakinomiya was the palace of Emperor Sujin's dynasty as recorded in the Rikkokushi (Japan's six national chronicles of the seventh and eight century).
Shiki no Mizukakinomiya was the palace of Emperor Sujin's dynasty as recorded in the Rikkokushi (Japan's six national chronicles of the seventh and eighth century).
sen.cmt: eight century→スペルミスですeighthに変更しました。
sen.e: Shiki no Mizukakinomiya was the palace of Emperor Sujin's dynasty as recorded in the Rikkokushi (Japan's six national chronicles of the seventh and eighth century).

sen.j: 現在、磯城瑞籬宮は奈良県桜井市金屋にあったとものと推定されており、志貴御県坐神社には大正年間に「崇神天皇磯城瑞籬宮跡」の石碑が建てられている。
sen.e: It is presently believed that the Shikino Mizukakinomiya was in Kaneya, Sakurai city, Nara Prefecture, and there is a stone monument at Shikinomiya Gataniimasu Shrine there is a stone monument called "Remains of Emperor Sujin's Shiki no Mizukakinomiya" that was purportedly built during the Taisho Era.

It is presently believed that the Shikino Mizukakinomiya was in Kaneya, Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture, and there was a stone monument called 'Remains of Emperor Sujin's Shiki no Mizukakinomiya' at Shikinomiya Gataniimasu Shrine that was purportedly built during the Taisho Era.
sen.cmt: Sakurai city→city大文字にしました。is→wasに修正しました。there is a stone monument→二重に書かれています。不要なので削除しました。"Remains of Emperor Sujin's Shiki no Mizukakinomiya"→原文は「」なので' 'に修正しました。
sen.e: It is presently believed that the Shikino Mizukakinomiya was in Kaneya, Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture, and there was a stone monument called 'Remains of Emperor Sujin's Shiki no Mizukakinomiya' at Shikinomiya Gataniimasu Shrine that was purportedly built during the Taisho Era.

sen.j: 本宮の北側には三輪山（大神神社）が鎮座する。
sen.e: To the north side of the main shrine is Mount Miya (Omiwa-jinja Shrine).
To the north side of the main shrine is Mount Miya (Omiwa-jinja Shrine).
To the north side of the main shrine is Mount Miya (Omiwa-jinja Shrine).

sen.j: 周辺には纏向遺跡をはじめとする古墳時代前後の遺跡が存在し、箸墓古墳やホケノ山古墳、崇神天皇陵、景行天皇陵、垂仁天皇陵などの巨大前方後円墳群が点在する。
sen.e: In the surrounding area are various artifacts from the Kofun Era, such as the Makimuku ruins, and large mausoleums and keyhole-shaped tombs that dot the area including the Hashihaka tomb, the Hokenoyama tomb, the burial mound of Emperor Suijin, the burial mound of Emperor Keiko, and the burial mound of Emperor Suinin.

There are various remains such as the Makimuku ruins from the Kofun Era in the surrounding area, and large keyhole-shaped tombs such as the Hashihaka tomb and Hokenoyama tomb, and burial mounds of Emperor Suijin, Emperor Keiko, and Emperor Suinin.
sen.cmt: 主語がありません。artifactsは誤訳です。
sen.e: There are various remains such as the Makimuku ruins from the Kofun Era in the surrounding area, and large keyhole-shaped tombs such as the Hashihaka tomb and Hokenoyama tomb, and burial mounds of Emperor Suijin, Emperor Keiko, and Emperor Suinin.
